pages.about: About Us | GoalStar Fantasy Football Dear visitors of our website! At GoalStar, we use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and provide a more personalized service. We value your trust and ensure that your information is handled securely and confidentially in accordance with our Privacy Policy. Accept Home About Contact About GoalStar | Fantasy Football Welcome to GoalStar Fantasy Football, where we bring your football passion to life through an engaging and dynamic fantasy sports experience. Our platform combines real-time updates, comprehensive analytics, and diverse contest options to give you the tools needed to manage your dream team effectively. Whether you're a seasoned player or new to the fantasy scene, GoalStar offers a variety of leagues and competitions tailored to every skill level. Join our community, strategize with cutting-edge insights, and elevate your fantasy football game to new heights. Discover the excitement of fantasy football with GoalStar today! Contact Us OUR MISSION MISSION Empowering Fans: We aim to empower football fans by giving them the tools and insights needed to build and manage their dream teams. Through advanced analytics, real-time updates, and user-friendly features, we ensure that every player has the opportunity to succeed and enjoy the game. Fostering Community: We strive to create a vibrant and inclusive community where football enthusiasts can connect, share strategies, and celebrate their love for the game. By facilitating interaction and collaboration, we enhance the overall experience and make fantasy football more enjoyable and rewarding. Innovating the Experience: Our commitment to innovation drives us to continuously improve our platform and offer new features that enhance gameplay. We stay at the forefront of technology and trends to provide a dynamic and exciting fantasy football experience that keeps our users engaged and entertained. Championing Fair Play: We are dedicated to promoting fairness and integrity in all aspects of our platform. Our mission is to ensure that every contest is conducted with transparency and that every player has a fair chance to compete and win, fostering a competitive yet friendly environment. MORE ABOUT US Our team consists of dedicated football fans and industry experts who understand the nuances of the game and the excitement of fantasy sports. This unique blend of passion and expertise allows us to create a platform that truly resonates with players and delivers a top-notch fantasy experience. We leverage the latest technology to ensure that our platform is both innovative and user-friendly. From advanced data analytics to real-time updates, our tech infrastructure is designed to provide you with the most accurate and timely information. This ensures that you can make well-informed decisions and enjoy a seamless gaming experience. We prioritize the needs and feedback of our users to continuously enhance our platform. Our intuitive design and responsive customer support are key aspects of our commitment to delivering an outstanding user experience. We actively listen to our community and implement features that enhance gameplay and satisfaction. About Us Home About Contact Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy Disclaimer Gambling Problem? Call 1-800-GAMBLER or 877-8-HOPENY/text HOPENY (467369) (NY). Help is available for problem gambling. Call (888) 789-7777 or visit ccpg.org(CT). Must be at least 18 years or older. Higher age limits may apply in some states. Paid contests not available while physically located in HI, ID, LA (select parishes) MT, NV, OR and WA. For entertainment purposes only. Winning a contest on DraftKings depends on knowledge and exercise of skill. Available to play for free. Void where prohibited. Eligibility restrictions apply. © 2024 GoalStar. All rights reserved.

Accept Home About Contact Welcome to GoalStar Fantasy Football Unleash your inner football manager with GoalStar! Create your dream team, compete in leagues, and showcase your football knowledge. Whether you're a seasoned fantasy veteran or a newcomer, GoalStar offers an exciting and immersive experience. Join now and take your passion for football to the next level! Contact Us ABOUT US At GoalStar Fantasy Football, we are passionate about bringing football fans closer to the action. Our platform allows you to step into the shoes of a football manager and experience the thrill of creating and managing your own dream team. Founded by a team of football enthusiasts, GoalStar combines the latest in sports analytics and gaming technology to deliver an immersive and engaging fantasy football experience. We believe in building a vibrant community where fans can share their love for the game, engage in friendly competition, and showcase their knowledge and skills. Whether you're new to fantasy football or a seasoned pro, our platform offers a variety of leagues and competitions to suit every level of expertise. Contact Us Real-Time Updates and Insights: Stay connected and informed with GoalStar’s real-time updates and in-depth insights, designed to give you a competitive edge. Our platform offers live player statistics, injury news, and match results, allowing you to make timely and informed decisions. Keep track of your players' performances, monitor their form, and respond quickly to any changes in the football landscape. In addition to real-time data, GoalStar provides expert analysis and tips, helping you understand key trends and identify potential breakout stars. Our advanced analytics offer a deeper dive into player metrics, including expected goals, assists, and defensive contributions, so you can make data-driven choices that enhance your team's performance. Whether you're an analytics enthusiast or a traditionalist, GoalStar's insights are tailored to enrich your fantasy football experience and keep you ahead of the curve. pages.policy: Privacy Policy | GoalStar Fantasy Football Dear visitors of our website! At GoalStar, we use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and provide a more personalized service. We value your trust and ensure that your information is handled securely and confidentially in accordance with our Privacy Policy. Accept Home About Contact Privacy Policy | GoalStar Fantasy Football Your privacy is important to us at GoalStar. Our Privacy Policy page details how we collect, use, and protect your personal information while you interact with our fantasy football platform. We are committed to ensuring your data is handled with the highest level of security and transparency. This policy outlines your rights regarding your information and our practices to maintain its confidentiality. For any questions or concerns about our privacy practices, please feel free to contact us. Your trust is paramount, and we are dedicated to safeguarding your privacy. Contact Privacy Policy | GoalStar Fantasy Football Introduction This Privacy Policy outlines the types of personal information collected by GoalStar, the fantasy football website, and how we use, share, and protect that information. By using our website, you consent to the data practices described in this policy. Information We Collect 1. Personal Information We may collect personal information from users during registration, including but not limited to your name, email address, and any other information you provide voluntarily. This information is essential for account creation and maintaining communication with you. 2. Usage Data We also gather data on how the website is accessed and used. This usage data may include information such as your computer's Internet Protocol address (IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our website that you visit, and the time and date of your visit. 3. Cookies and Tracking Technologies GoalStar uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to monitor activity on our website. Cookies are files with a small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. How We Use Your Information 4. Account Management The primary purpose of collecting personal information is to create and manage your account. This includes providing customer support, updating you about your account status, and responding to your inquiries. 5. Notifications and Promotions We may use your information to send you newsletters, marketing materials, and other information that may be of interest to you. You can opt-out of receiving these communications at any time by following the unsubscribe instructions provided in the emails. 6. Analytics We use collected data to analyze how our users interact with the website, allowing us to improve our services and enhance user experience. This analysis helps us understand website performance and user behavior. Information Sharing and Disclosure 7. Third-Party Service Providers We may employ third-party companies and individuals to facilitate our services, provide the website on our behalf, or assist us in analyzing how our website is used. These third parties have access to your personal information only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose. 8. Legal Requirements GoalStar may disclose your personal information in the belief that such action is necessary to comply with legal obligations, protect and defend our rights, prevent fraud, or protect the safety of our users. 9. Business Transfers If GoalStar is involved in a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, your personal information may be transferred. We will provide notice before your personal information is transferred and becomes subject to a different Privacy Policy. Data Retention and Security 10. Data Retention We will retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy. We will retain your data to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. 11. Security Measures The security of your personal information is important to us. We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal data, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. Therefore, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. Your Rights 12. Access to Information You have the right to access the personal information we hold about you. If you wish to obtain a copy of this information, please contact us using the information provided below. 13. Rectification of Information If you believe that any information we hold about you is inaccurate or incomplete, you have the right to request that we correct it. 14. Deletion of Information You have the right to request the deletion of your personal data, subject to certain legal obligations we must comply with. Upon your request, we will delete your information unless we need to keep it for lawful purposes. Home About Contact Terms & Conditions Privacy Policy Disclaimer Gambling Problem? Call 1-800-GAMBLER or 877-8-HOPENY/text HOPENY (467369) (NY). Help is available for problem gambling. Call (888) 789-7777 or visit ccpg.org(CT). Must be at least 18 years or older. Higher age limits may apply in some states. Paid contests not available while physically located in HI, ID, LA (select parishes) MT, NV, OR and WA. For entertainment purposes only.
